description: MEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER re: 21 MOTION to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Corrected Amended Class Action Complaint. filed by Lemonade Insurance Agency, LLC, Lemonade Insurance Company, Lemonade, Inc., Lemonade Ltd., Lemonade Life Insurance Agency, LLC. The Court has considered all of the arguments of the parties. To the extent not specifically addressed above, the arguments are either moot or without merit. For the foregoing reasons, the motion to dismiss is granted to the extent it seeks to dismiss the claims for unjust enrichment and declaratory relief, and denied in all other respects. The Clerk is directed to close all pending motions. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Judge John G. Koeltl on 8/8/2022) (ks) Transmission to Orders and Judgments Clerk for processing. (Entered: 08/09/2022)
